description: Manages VM snapshots on Apache CloudStack based clouds.

snapshot_memory.description: Snapshot memory if set to true.

domain.description: Domain the VM snapshot is related to.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

poll_async.description: Poll async jobs until job has finished.

tags.description: List of tags. Tags are a list of dictionaries having keys C(key) and C(value). To delete all tags, set a empty list e.g. C(tags: []).

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

project.description: Name of the project the VM is assigned to.

account.description: Account the VM snapshot is related to.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.

zone.description: Name of the zone in which the VM is in. If not set, default zone is used.

name.description: Unique Name of the snapshot. In CloudStack terms display name.
